rooms.name: Lobby / Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light and ample space for entry and reception.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean-themed living area with open spaces, built-in seating, and a view towards the garden for positive Vastu energy.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated office space with a north-east corner placement to enhance productivity while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A casual dining area integrated with the living room for Mediterranean style communal space.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The primary entry point aligning with local norms and offering natural lighting.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Door
openings.description: Provides access to the patio and garden area, ensuring a seamless indoor-outdoor transition.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Entry for utilities and deliveries, maintaining functional separation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom placed in the southwest quadrant to harness positive energy, with a large window for light.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: Adjacent to the master bedroom providing scenic views and additional living space while respecting Vastu.

openings.name: Interior Staircase
openings.description: A compact staircase connecting ground and upper floor; designed to be both safe and aesthetically pleasing.

openings.name: Balcony Entrance
openings.description: Provides direct access to the balcony for ventilation and natural light.

rooms.name: Home Theater / Entertainment Room
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment space with optimal acoustics and seating arrangements; designed to adhere to Vastu by being placed in a location that minimizes disturbance.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact space for storage and miscellaneous utilities, placed away from living areas per local norms.

openings.name: Service Elevator
openings.description: Provides access to lower level storage areas and ensures proper integration with the main structure.

openings.name: Secondary Entrance
openings.description: A discreet entry for maintenance and additional services.
